name: com.omiyagames.embedwebgltemplate
description: WebGL Template for creating WebGL builds that can be embedded into popular web portals. This template will automatically resize to fit within the embed, including fullscreen.

samples.description: Embeddable WebGL Template, with Unity logo and a percentage number indicating how much progress loading the Unity game has made.
Same as the Embed WebGL Template above, but with Omiya Games' logo over the HTML loading bar.
